headline: Sylvia Jukes Morris, Biographer of Clare Boothe Luce, Dies at 84
abstract: She spent 33 years on the two-volume biography, examining 460,000 items at the Library of Congress that stretched 319 linear feet.
lead_paragraph: When Sylvia Jukes Morris was writing her monumental two-volume biography of Clare Boothe Luce, she discovered several facts at variance with what Ms. Luce had put forth in the public record.
